website_summaries.verdict: Add a touch of elegance to any holiday party with this aesthetically pleasing and durable tray.
pros: Crystal trays are clear, sparkling, and dishwasher safe
Trays have a quality, weighted feel and resemble a sleigh
An aesthetically pleasing way to present and serve appetizers or desserts at your holiday parties
cons: Serving tray is not easily portable, so it's best to keep in one spot

customer_reviews.title: Would be perfect if it all connected
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful, looked wonderful for pictures, held our cupcakes just fine, would be perfect if the pieces connected someway instead of just stacking on top of one another, I don't know how many times it was almost broken by someone moving it that wasn't aware that the frame wasn't all one piece or not connected.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer D. Benningfield

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one, lol. I purchased one to use in my Sweets shop as a display. I liked it so much, that I "rob" it from the store for events all the time. It comes apart easily to move it from one place to another, yet is sturdy when put together. I got the second one to use them on each end of my dessert tables for weddings, etc. The crystal is heavy, which is an indication that it is "good" crystal since it has a high lead content and they are really lovely on your table.
customer_reviews.author: desertfox

customer_reviews.title: It's really pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed when I saw how pretty this server is. It was perfect for my event. I would recommend to anyone interested. TIP: find a way to make the pieces fit securely in together. I used a hot glue to make the bottom pieces of the server thicker so when I pushed the top pieces into place they would be secure.
customer_reviews.author: I do shop.

customer_reviews.title: This looks nice..
customer_reviews.text: This looks nice... however, I'm not sure if I didn't read the description, but it's not very sturdy. When it's put together, I can't just easily pick it up and move it. I'd have to remove the plates. So this is fine, if you're going to leave it one place and never move it. Otherwise, I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this server!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for every get together we host. It is my go-to as it adds that finishing touch on whatever we are serving. It also is simple to take apart, and the dishes nest into each other for easy storage. I loaned it to some friends, and they liked it so much I just recently gifted them one.
customer_reviews.author: Depot

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Arrived on time. I sprayed the silver legs gold, to go with my table decor.
customer_reviews.author: kathiana a.

customer_reviews.title: Get these!
customer_reviews.text: These are really beautiful and functionally awesome! Took a star because they are a tad unstable, but if you’re not jostling it around too much does a really nice job! I’d recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Linda
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived as stated and packaged well. Tiered server is beautiful and easy to assemble. The problem is the racks don't support the crystal trays. Once assembled and food or treats put on for serving, there is about a 75% chance it won't topple over. I think if you're handy you can figure out something. Don't think the buyer should have to. Have not tried anything yet. The manufacturer should fix this.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: It' a bit wobbly
customer_reviews.text: This stand is very classy and clean looking. It will be used on a dessert buffet for a wedding. However, I wasn't clear on what others said in their reviews regarding it not being so sturdy. The leg pieces fit together, but they don't snap together. Once assembled, DO NOT MOVE unless you take the crystal plates off first. If you have it where it needs to be for the time you need it out, you will be fine. Otherwise, I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Erdmann

customer_reviews.title: Very Unstable
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece of equipment; however, the manufacturer should have permanently welded this unit together into one piece for stability. The connection joints are not tight enough and the unit wobbles entirely too much!
customer_reviews.author: Shopalot

customer_reviews.title: Can get this at Ross dress for less for $15. Worth it there.
customer_reviews.text: It looks ok. Not sturdy at all! Had to use tape to make it hold better. You can get this at Ross dress for less for $15. Was ya pleased to find that out.
customer_reviews.author: bob taylor

customer_reviews.title: Overall good!
customer_reviews.text: This display is so pretty! It's a little bit wobbly but you can trust the glass on it as well as it to hold food. If you're going to move it, move with caution. However, once it's placed it's sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased with this
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful serving piece! It seems well made but, the silver part is not as nice as the trays. It just feels cheaper. It looked great and held a nice amount.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: So pretty and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to assemble and it so pretty. We used it for Italian cookies at my daughter's wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice display!
customer_reviews.text: Made a great table display for appetizers! Easy to put together, pretty, sturdy, stores compactly.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Smith

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loved it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this 3 Tier Server. I had a dinner party and everyone asked, where you buy this beautiful 3 Tier Server? Of course on Amazon 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous piece for the price. Glass is solid, metal racks (assembly required) are solid. It seemed a little unstable, until I put the glass pieces in. Absolutely love!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Ledford

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but has a defect!
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful item, but had to give it 3 stars due to some sort of defect on one of the crystal plates. Looks like some sort of acid feel on it and make a little rough circle on the plate. Disappointed that I don’t have time to ship it back due to needing it for a baby shower in a few days!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for entertaining
customer_reviews.text: The picture doesn't do this product justice. This is a very nice piece to use for entertaining. I used it for hor d'oeuvres at a baby shower snd it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Blair

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't very stable
customer_reviews.text: Crystal is nice but it is very stable to stand and carry. It always got a part. So, I did not like the item.
customer_reviews.author: SAJE

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. It moves as some mentioned however I still found it to be stable. Great quality. I used it at a wedding shower dessert table and then utilized in my bathroom on my sink as another purchaser mentioned doing. Looks amazing and wasnt a one time use purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie White

customer_reviews.title: elegant
customer_reviews.text: i love this serving 3 tiered tray so much,the quality is more than expected. I would recommend this product to anyone reading this.
customer_reviews.author: bvandyk

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Pretty! Very happy with it. Can be disassembled for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Jsteele

customer_reviews.title: Moderately dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and the assembly is easy but very disappointed it is unsteady and moves side to side . I returned it thinking it was defective but this one does the same thing . It was a gift for my friend and she won’t let me return it again .
customer_reviews.author: Kim Pickard

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and useful stand
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful it sparkles and very good quality. Using it for my makeup, facial and dental stand
customer_reviews.author: Judith F. Reel

customer_reviews.title: Unstable
customer_reviews.text: I liked the glass trays and the cut of the glass. Wish trays would have been wider and deeper. I had to stack my food to have enough out for first service of food. But what I disliked the most was how unstable the legs were with trays even in place. There should be some type of bar on the bottom from side to side to make it more sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Shuping

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly, we’ll packag and is exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: R McKenna

customer_reviews.title: this item appears good sturdy quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. From what I saw before I wrapped it up, this item appears good sturdy quality. I'm considering one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Brown

customer_reviews.title: ARRIVED BROKEN
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT ORDER THIS PRODUCT it arrived shattered. I was planning on using it for an event today and I received it broken so now I have nothing to use. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: farahnaz b.

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Piece!
customer_reviews.text: This was a beautiful addition to my serving ware. So elegant and easy to assemble and store!
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Cute but horrible design. There is no bar in the middle to keep it from swaying back and forth easily.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L Scharbach

customer_reviews.title: Great value!! Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered ahead of schedule. It’s a beautiful serving dish and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: jncsmom7

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for a baby shower, and was a hit. We have cookies & M&M treats. Love the look; we also used it for empanadas. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Whitestone

customer_reviews.title: Its beautiful and worked great for my partys appetizers
customer_reviews.text: Its beautiful and worked great for my partys appetizers. The only reason i didn't give 5 stars is because its wobbly and doesnt lock in place somehow.. if you try to move it it might come apart.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M. Burgos

customer_reviews.title: Pretty stand but...
customer_reviews.text: The whole stand was nice and pretty, but, one of the glass plates were broken and I Want to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Get it if not
customer_reviews.text: Got it as gift and she loves it . Good price
customer_reviews.author: AAA

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to assemble and beautiful to present my sweets 😊

customer_reviews.title: Great product for my family dinner this holiday
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time, easy to assemble and looks nice. I will be putting 3 different desserts on it this holiday.
customer_reviews.author: lsintim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the quality, the style and price. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Evelynda Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Service Piece
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant and beautiful server. Used it to display different kind of cheeses at dessert time. Looking forward to displaying it and using it again.
customer_reviews.author: Dian

customer_reviews.title: If I can be send a replacement for the broken tray, I will be glad
customer_reviews.text: The product is beautiful but one glass tray came broken
customer_reviews.author: gursharn sekhon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! LOVE! LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this piece! It is so beautiful. I bought it to use for a Tea I hosted recently. It comes in several pieces, but is easy to put together. It's also nice to be able to take it back apart for storage. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful but not stable.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of these for my baby shower. They are beautiful but not stable. Just make sure you put them some where they cant be bumped and knocked over.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: I loved it, it wasn't too big and it wasn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved it, it wasn't too big and it wasn't too small, it was perfect for what I needed it for and it looked very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: spiderman@net

customer_reviews.title: but it is lovely and will be a nice addition for the functions we are planning to use ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not had the chance to use this, but it is lovely and will be a nice addition for the functions we are planning to use it at!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice piece for the price. Stand is a little loose but the glass plates are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this affordable set.
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this very affordable display stand. I have already used it for three different events. It fits together easily and is so attractive. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Readingteacher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great love this item can't wait to show it off!

customer_reviews.title: I bought it two months ago and It looks like new. It is perfect for any activity and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it two months ago and It looks like new. It is perfect for any activity and it is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: andrea cedron

customer_reviews.title: ... have one party and tier is was look really good with pastries
customer_reviews.text: I was have one party and tier is was look really good with pastries, on the table.
customer_reviews.author: lucrecia bruce

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful display! The plates are heavy Crystal
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful display! The plates are heavy Crystal. The stand is very easy to put together. My presentation was awesome. I believe the food even tasted better because it looked delicious. Presentation is everything!
customer_reviews.author: Treva Miles

customer_reviews.title: Party tray
customer_reviews.text: Product is nice but the frame for the crystal platters is unstable for support. Nice presentation but not stable, have to be very careful around it or it can dismantle easily
customer_reviews.author: ppellegrin

customer_reviews.title: Perfume repurpose.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! I was looking for a way to display my perfumes and this was the perfect find. I do wish that it fit together more snugly so you could move it as one piece without worry. It came in very protective packaging and nothing was damaged. It looks great!
customer_reviews.author: MurphsLaw

customer_reviews.text: Second time purchasing this! First time I bought it an year ago, it was definitely $10 less in price which I find amusing. Both times were bought as a gift! Will probably buy for myself as well! Its such a perfect house-warming gift. It looks elegant and super useful.
customer_reviews.author: Darkmane

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful / Arrived just in time / Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's bridal shower. It arrived the day before and was super simple to assemble. It looked beautiful with the mini cupcakes but would also be beautiful with crackers and cheese, fresh fruit or cookies. I bought it for me for the holidays but my daughter has already claimed it for her new home.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Nice.....
customer_reviews.text: They are NOT James Scott Crystal....They are form "The Dublin Collection" Shannon crystal..... Still nice but... i don't appreciate the "False Advertising".....
customer_reviews.author: Miss K.

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant and pretty.
customer_reviews.text: It seems a little wobbly. Hoping when I fill the trays it will be sturdier. Would still recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied with this product and certainly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this product and certainly recommend it! I used it several times and because one of my guests loved it, I loaned it to her for her son's wedding shower. It's beautiful and functional, a winning combination!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Undecided
customer_reviews.text: Came beautifully and carefully wrapped.The glass is really nice.True to size.The silver sides are extremly plastic and cheap. Not quite sure if I trust it yet. Once you get it set up,which of course takes 1 minute,I think it might hold up.
customer_reviews.author: David & Kathy B.

customer_reviews.title: Really  elegant
customer_reviews.text: Is so pretty and held my dipped strawberries without problems
customer_reviews.author: L.K.

customer_reviews.title: Broken!
customer_reviews.text: My item arrived with a broken shelf, white I didn't discover until I unboxed it for cupcakes ST MY WEDDING RECEPTION. Fantastic! My guests ate from the baker's box. So embarrassing and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Angi Just

customer_reviews.title: It's gorgeous and perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is just gorgeous and really looks so beautiful on my appetizer and dessert tables! highly recommend! you can also move it to the left and right if you want to reposition for purpose of aesthetics or space. love it!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Steven Feig

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: I used these for display for my products at events. They are elegant and fit my theme greatly. The weight is amazing and i'm glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Destina Walter

customer_reviews.title: Arrived cracked, mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for our Thanksgiving dinner, we used it for appetizers. Unfortunately, I should have opened it before the day to see if it was ok. Found out that one of the glass platters arrived cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Better priced elsewhere. Flimsy but looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Over priced!!!!! Saw this in Ross for 19.99. Also, Its a little flimsy. But it looks nice

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup, great quality and definitely a elegant piece. Exactly what I needed.

customer_reviews.title: Looks more expensive
customer_reviews.text: This was very pretty as part of our “English High Tea” display at school!

customer_reviews.title: Great Crystal Showcase
customer_reviews.text: This item was perfect for our event. Easy setup! Easy disassemble. Great showing. Crystal Glass is heavy enough to hold food items.

customer_reviews.title: Server
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful. Will be used at my daughter's wedding shower. Bought two of them wish I had bought four other them.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: It is absolutely beautiful, It is easily knocked over however, and it is much smaller then it appears. However; I love it and will be using it alot. Worth the money for sure......used it on my buffet for my wedding.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: perfect size for appetizers and desserts
customer_reviews.text: very attractive piece. perfect size for appetizers and desserts. I bought two and place them back to back for an appealing staircase look. a little difficult to work with as comes in several pieces and need extra hands to hold it together while putting it up

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: James Scott Crystal 3 Tier Rectangle Server
feature_bullets: TRUE BEAUTY IS ONLY FOUND WHEN WITH JAMES SCOTT - Created from crystal its unique design is hand-cut and deeply faceted for extra sparkle.
DISHWASHER SAFE - This attractive piece is dishwasher safe. Feel free to use it as often as you like knowing that you can use the dishwasher for it.

Elevate your delicate holiday sweets desserts & cupcakes with this 3 tiered server. Sleek and elegant this stand features 3 separate tiers. This display will help you showcase all the delectable goodies served at your party or wedding in an all time eye-catching way with visual appeal. The JAMES SCOTT 3-tier server dresses up any buffet table with an appealing food presentation.
GIVES A DISTINGUISHED LOOK WHEREVER YOU PLACE IT - This gorgeous server features a 3-step design and will make an unforgettable impression on your guests.

CLICK "ADD TO CART" TO GET YOUR OWN JAMES SCOTT 3 TIER SERVER VERY SOON - By buying this James Scott 3 tier server you know that you made the right choice. With James Scott products you'll never regret your buying.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars203 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
